content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good day, Emilia. Thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate with you, so I can get the lowest possible rental price.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I would like to negotiate with you. I would like to have a good relationship with you as my landlord. I would like to negotiate with you in order to find the best possible rental price for me. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in negotiating the rental price with me, Emilia. I appreciate your desire for a positive relationship as my tenant. My proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment is €800 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine
